title: Pixel 3 XL won't charge via USB-C since June 2020 update
content: My Pixel 3 XL has been having issues charging for the last few weeks. I have tried using multiple different USB-C cables and Google power accessories (I don't know what you call the block that goes into the wall). I have a Google Pixel XL that I'm currently using as my phone until I can find out what's going on with the phone. Anyone else have the same problem?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
